paper_abstract: A new inequality for the universal integral on abstract spaces is obtained in a rather general form. As two corollaries, Minkowski's and Chebyshev's type inequalities for the universal integral are obtained. The main results of this paper generalize some previous results obtained for special fuzzy integrals, e.g., Choquet and Sugeno integrals. Furthermore, related inequalities for seminormed integral are obtained. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: General Chebyshev type inequalities for universal integral
